title: "Scrape data"
output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```


```{r}
index <- xml2::read_html("https://www.csa.fr/csapluralisme/tableau") %>%
  parse_index_page

odt <- index %>%
  filter(str_detect(tabular_link, ".odt$")) %>% 
  mutate(dt = paste0("https://www.csa.fr", tabular_link) %>% map(parse_odt)) %>%
  glimpse


```
